Current market prices

Source: R/market-price.R
market_price.Rd

Current market prices

market_price(mid)

Arguments

mid

The integer market ID.

Format

A tibble with 7 variables:

time

The hour or day of price

mid

Market ID

market

Market question

cid

Contract ID

contract

Question answers

last

Most recent trading price of the contract

close

Price at the end of the previous midnight EST

Value

A data frame of market contracts prices.

Examples

market_price(mid = 6653)
#> # A tibble: 16 x 8
#>    time                  mid market   cid contract  last close
#>    <dttm>              <int> <chr>  <int> <fct>    <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 2020-07-16 13:42:15  6653 Elect… 22320 GOP by …  0.02  0.03
